channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-29728] TablePlanner prevents Flink from starting is working directory is a symbolic link
item.description:
The Flink runtime throws an exception when using the table API if the working directory is a symbolic link. This is the case when run on AWS EMR with Yarn. There is a similar issue here and I believe the same fix applied there would work.

 

 

Caused by: org.apache.flink.table.api.TableException: Could not initialize the table planner components loader.

item.summary: TablePlanner prevents Flink from starting is working directory is a symbolic link

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: angelok Thanks for reporting this, the code that will cause problems is the same as FLINK-28102, I will fix it together in that ticket. To facilitate tracking issue, I suggest closing this ticket.
